content.add_first_content: Add your first content item to get started
content.reorder_tip: Drag items to rearrange their display order
content.no_content_items_desc: This project doesn't have any content items yet
content.choose_item_to_view: Choose an item from the list to view and edit its details
content.item_not_found_description: The selected content item could not be loaded or was deleted.
content.drag_tip: Tip: Drag items by their handle to reorder
content.sub_item_description_placeholder: Describe this sub-item, its significance, details, and any interesting information visitors should know...
content.content_item_description_placeholder: Describe this content item, its context, significance, and what visitors can expect to learn...
content.sub_item_ai_placeholder: Provide content-specific knowledge for this sub-item. Include facts, specifications, historical details, or contextual information...
content.content_item_ai_placeholder: Provide content-specific knowledge for this content item. Include facts, specifications, historical details, or contextual information...
content.ai_knowledge_info: This content-specific knowledge helps the AI provide accurate and detailed responses about this {type}.
content.single_mode_hint: Single mode allows only one content item.
content.single_mode_empty_desc: Add your page content with title, description, and optional image.
content.grouped_mode_empty_desc: Add categories to organize items into groups. Each category can contain multiple items.
content.list_mode_empty_desc: Add items to create a simple list. Perfect for links, contacts, or quick references.
content.grid_mode_empty_desc: Add items with images to create a visual gallery. Perfect for menus, portfolios, or catalogs.
content.inline_mode_empty_desc: Add full-width cards with images and descriptions. Perfect for featured content or announcements.
content.empty_content_desc: Add content items to get started.
content.add_content_hint: Add content items to get started
content.category_description: This category groups related items together
content.name: Name
content.delete_item_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
content.delete_category_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category? All sub-items will also be deleted.
content.ai_knowledge_placeholder: Add knowledge to help the AI provide better responses about this item...
content.import_csv_tooltip: Bulk import content items from a CSV file
content.bulk_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} content item(s)? This action cannot be undone.

bulk_import.upload_description: Upload a CSV or Excel file containing your content items. The first row should contain column headers.
bulk_import.drop_csv_here: Drop your CSV or Excel file here
bulk_import.req_first_row_headers: First row must be column headers
bulk_import.template_hint: Your file should include at minimum a column for the item title/name.
bulk_import.template_downloaded_detail: Use this template as a guide for your import file
bulk_import.invalid_file_type_detail: Please upload a CSV or Excel file (.csv, .xlsx, .xls)
bulk_import.no_data_detail: The CSV file appears to be empty or contains only headers.
bulk_import.mapping_description: Map each CSV column to a content field. Columns mapped to "Skip" will be ignored.
bulk_import.select_category_desc: Choose which category these items should be added to.
bulk_import.error_name_required: You must map at least one column to "Title (name)".
bulk_import.error_duplicate_mapping: Each field can only be mapped to one column.
bulk_import.preview_description: Showing {showing} of {count} rows. Review the data before importing.
bulk_import.importing_to_category: Items will be imported to category: {category}
bulk_import.please_wait: Please do not close this window.

form.single_content_placeholder: Write your full page content here. Supports rich text formatting...
form.single_ai_placeholder: Additional context for AI to answer questions about this page...
form.single_ai_hint: Help the AI assistant provide accurate answers about this content
form.ai_knowledge_hint: This information helps the AI provide accurate, detailed responses about this specific item.
form.category_subtitle: Create a group header for organizing items
form.category_name_hint: This will appear as a section header
form.category_ai_placeholder: What should the AI know about this category?
form.category_ai_hint: Context for AI when answering questions about this category
form.grouped_item_subtitle: Add an item under this category
form.grouped_item_name_placeholder: e.g., Caesar Salad, iPhone 15, Exhibit A...
form.grouped_item_ai_placeholder: Details for AI to share about this item...
form.grouped_item_ai_hint: Facts the AI can use when visitors ask questions
form.list_item_content_hint: Enter a URL or short description
form.list_item_ai_placeholder: What should AI know about this item?
form.list_item_ai_hint: Help AI explain this item to visitors
form.grid_image_hint: Square images (1:1) work best for grid layout
form.grid_item_subtitle: Create a visual item for the gallery
form.grid_item_ai_hint: Facts the AI can use when visitors ask questions
form.inline_item_ai_placeholder: Context for AI about this item...

import.bulk_import_desc: Import cards with embedded images from Excel files. Images are automatically extracted and processed.
import.example_card_desc: Load a complete example experience with AI prompts, content hierarchy, and embedded images.
import.or_click_to_browse_multiple: or click to browse (multiple files supported)
import.req_multiple_files: Multiple files or multi-card files supported
import.example_loaded_desc: Review the preview below to understand the import structure, then click "Confirm Import" to try it!
import.example_load_failed_desc: Could not load the example file. Please try downloading and uploading the template manually.
import.template_downloaded_desc: Excel template with examples and formulas downloaded successfully
import.file_size_limit: File size must be less than 50MB
import.file_analyzed_desc_with_images: Found {count} content items with {images} embedded images.
import.validation_issues_desc: Please fix the {errors} errors in your file before importing.
import.failed_analyze_uploaded_file: Failed to analyze the uploaded file
import.duplicate_cards_will_be_renamed: Duplicate cards will be automatically renamed with a timestamp to avoid conflicts.
